  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        my_analyzer: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["lowercase", "custom_stems", "porter_stem"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        custom_stems: {
          type: "stemmer_override",

      },

});
